description: This file defines a Flutter widget called EmptyState, which displays a centered UI component with an icon, title, and subtitle, used to indicate an empty state in the app.

classes.name: EmptyState
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that presents an icon, title, and subtitle centered on the screen, used to show an empty state message.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, laying out the icon, title, and subtitle within a centered column.
